column5: What happned to the pinned post.  Just seeing and occasionally reading it made the cold weather bearable! Come on June!!!!!!
We're just trying to keep the top uncluttered. It was simply unpinned. We'll stick it back once we get a bit closer.
....It has been unpinned for the time being Gary. It'll likely get repinned when the warmer weather returns.  It's still on the board somewhere, I'll see if I can locate it.
...Awe man, Rick beat me to it by a minute.   Anyhow,  you can find the thread here.
